Thank you for contributing a translation to this mod!  
Before submitting your pull request, please ensure the following:  

[ ] Your PR is targeting the default branch (usually `1.21(.1)`).  
[ ] Your translation is accurate and follows the formatting/style of the default en_us.json.
[ ] You have removed this message before submitting.  

If you're unsure about anything, feel free ask me directly either via email (mailto:contact@pnku.de) or by joining the Discord (https://dsc.lieonlion.dev) and contacting me there.
